title: Puerto Rico holds hearings on proposed power bill increases as customers fume and outages persist
description: Puerto Rico's Energy Bureau is holding hearings on proposed fee increases from private power companies, potentially raising residential bills by 40%.
content: Puerto Rico's Energy Bureau is holding hearings on proposed fee increases from private power companies, potentially raising residential bills by 40%.
